909856aedd3119b091ac684500e77617ca794e8a.commit.message:
Ensure that the root node of the newly created CombinedConfiguration is initialized when it is returned from the builder.

This changes makes it possible to use read-only combined configurations
with a NoOpSynchronizer because no further initialization is needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488577 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
909856aedd3119b091ac684500e77617ca794e8a.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

2d257bd2e7c89ac3067e1b440a9f22645f9e0f82.commit.message:
Fixed a dead lock problem with DynamicCombinedConfiguration.

There was a problem with read operations when a new child configuration had to
be created. This requires a write lock which caused the thread to hang. The
new solution determines the current configuration at the very begin of an
operation.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488576 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
2d257bd2e7c89ac3067e1b440a9f22645f9e0f82.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

019462f82da92d184c7e6a2b0ca5f8ecb6009e3f.commit.message:
Adapted beginRead() and beginWrite() methods in CombinedConfiguration.

The readLock() and writeLock() methods were removed. They could cause
problems because they obtained locks without using the standard means. This
could break subclasses that rely on symmetric invocations of beginRead()/
endRead() and beginWrite()/endWrite() respective.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488575 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
019462f82da92d184c7e6a2b0ca5f8ecb6009e3f.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

b584ffaa3c73d686ecccff9c0d1ac3c58b2a549a.commit.message:
Added an optimize flag to the beginRead() and beginWrite() methods.

This allows derived classes that override these methods to perform special
optimization. This is needed for instance for CombinedConfiguration; this
class has methods which need synchronized access, but do not require the
full combined configuration to be constructed. The alternative would be
to call the Synchronizer directly, but this is a source of trouble as it
circumvents the standard mechanisms for obtaining and releasing locks.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488573 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
b584ffaa3c73d686ecccff9c0d1ac3c58b2a549a.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

3ce34eb67026ad9311bbc014caa85351effb45c8.commit.message:
Fixed a problem with BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.clone() related to SubnodeConfiguration management.

It must be ensured that the cloned configuration creates its own data
structures for managing SubnodeConfigurations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488572 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
3ce34eb67026ad9311bbc014caa85351effb45c8.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

fb99dcac2d620ac5f277e33d09ba6577fb906d95.commit.message:
Reworked DynamicCombinedConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

The class now uses its Synchronizer to protect its internal state against
concurrent access. All tests could be enabled again (after configuring a
fully functional Synchronizer).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488570 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
fb99dcac2d620ac5f277e33d09ba6577fb906d95.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

aca71b7fe3a26e4adb4cd12b186b045d9cee4182.commit.message:
Fixed missing svn properties svn:eol-style and svn:keywords.

5fab7a143dddba15d8f4eddc4e323956c7fc38ea.commit.message:
Reenabled a test case that was failing before.

The test method now sets a proper Synchronizer before accessing the test
configuration concurrently.
